Metaphor:POVERTY IS A MOTION IMPEDIMENT

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Name Gloss POVERTY IS A MOTION IMPEDIMENT
Name Transcription
Aliases
Description e.g. "chained by poverty"
Comments Needs full mappings.

Is the overarching case for Poverty is a Burden, Poverty is a Chain, Poverty is Confinement...

Tags
Family Poverty metaphors, Poverty as an individual problem metaphors
Metaphor Level General
Metaphor Type
Experiential Basis
Cultural Scope
Source Frame Motion impediments
Roles:mover, impediment, mover_location, mover_motion_x-schema
Target Frame Poverty
Roles:amount of resources, cause_of_impoverished_state, impoverished_entity, impoverished_state, degree of poverty


Mappings:

impoverished_entity <= mover
impoverished_state <= mover_location
cause_of_impoverished_state <= impediment

Relation Type is related to

Entailments:


Examples:

Example Text: Though politically the country is free, its people remain chained by poverty.
